message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 16-6-2, translated into en
data:
The ratio of state budget expenditure to the approved state budget expenditure estimate is the ratio between the total expenditure of the Government and the approved estimate in a certain period of time.

State budget expenditures according to current regulations include: Expenditure on development investment, expenditure on national reserve, recurrent expenditure, payment of debt and interest, expenditure on aid and other expenditures as prescribed by law.
